title: Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: The Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time are right around the corner. Titled “Hot Tub Week,” the upcoming episode of the ABC medical drama will continue to see Dr. Max Bankman treat more interesting medical cases aboard the titular ship with the support of the crew. author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Curious about the release date and time of Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14? Read on for all the details, including where to watch it.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time are right around the corner. Titled “Hot Tub Week,” the upcoming episode of the ABC medical drama will continue to see Dr. Max Bankman treat more interesting medical cases aboard the titular ship with the support of the crew. As per the official synopsis, Episode 14 will see the Odyssey welcome a group of cheerleaders onboard. Meanwhile, Avery receives some distressing news, prompting Max and Tristan to help her through it. So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where the upcoming episode of the show will become available for streaming. When is the Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 release date & time? The episode’s release date is Thursday, April 10, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 PM PT and 9:00 PM ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeApril 10, 20259:00 PMPacific TimeApril 10, 20256:00 PM Doctor Odyssey debuted in September 2024, with episodes arriving weekly before going on a mid-season break in November. While the makers haven’t announced an official episode count, Season 1 is scheduled to feature 18 episodes at least. Where to watch Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 You can watch Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 via ABC and shortly after on Hulu. ABC and Hulu are both owned by the media conglomerate Walt Disney Company and offer a wide variety of entertainment. Hulu’s digital library is the home to all content from the banners of like NBC, ABC, A&E, Big Ten Network, Bravo, E!, and popular networks. Some of the most notable titles you can enjoy on the streaming platform include The Handmaid’s Tale, Good American Family, Deli Boys, and many more. What is Doctor Odyssey about? The official synopsis for Doctor Odyssey is as follows: “Max is the new on-board doctor for a luxury cruise ship where the small but mighty medical team navigate unique medical crises and each other, miles from shore.”
html:
The Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time are right around the corner. Titled “Hot Tub Week,” the upcoming episode of the ABC medical drama will continue to see Dr. Max Bankman treat more interesting medical cases aboard the titular ship with the support of the crew. As per the official synopsis, Episode 14 will see the Odyssey welcome a group of cheerleaders onboard. Meanwhile, Avery receives some distressing news, prompting Max and Tristan to help her through it.

So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where the upcoming episode of the show will become available for streaming.

When is the Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is Thursday, April 10, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 PM PT and 9:00 PM ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Doctor Odyssey debuted in September 2024, with episodes arriving weekly before going on a mid-season break in November. While the makers haven’t announced an official episode count, Season 1 is scheduled to feature 18 episodes at least.

Where to watch Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14

You can watch Doctor Odyssey Season 1 Episode 14 via ABC and shortly after on Hulu.

ABC and Hulu are both owned by the media conglomerate Walt Disney Company and offer a wide variety of entertainment. Hulu’s digital library is the home to all content from the banners of like NBC, ABC, A&E, Big Ten Network, Bravo, E!, and popular networks. Some of the most notable titles you can enjoy on the streaming platform include The Handmaid’s Tale, Good American Family, Deli Boys, and many more.

What is Doctor Odyssey about?

The official synopsis for Doctor Odyssey is as follows:

“Max is the new on-board doctor for a luxury cruise ship where the small but mighty medical team navigate unique medical crises and each other, miles from shore.”
